akn:subsection.akn:heading: Requirement of Potential Department of Defense Interest.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Funds appropriated to the Department of Defense or to a military department may not be used to finance any research project or study unless the project or study is, in the opinion of the Secretary of Defense or the Secretary of that military department, respectively, of potential interest to the Department of Defense or to such military department, respectively.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Additional Provisions Applicable to Cooperative Agreements.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Additional authorities, conditions, and requirements relating to certain cooperative agreements authorized by this section are provided in sections 4021 and 4026 of this title.
